abstracts.cdata!:
The sustainable energy project, started
            in 2007 in Macedonia was aimed to develop a sustainable
            market for energy efficiency and renewable energy by
            supporting the development of an enabling framework,
            institutional capacity, and necessary financing mechanisms.
            However, the project was proposed to be restructured in 2010
            following an evaluation process. The proposed changes
            include: 1) institutional support and technical assistance;
            2) financial support for energy efficiency in public
            buildings; and 3) sustainable energy funding facility.
